name: NSMB - Mario Vs Luigi
description:
A unity-standalone 2-10 player remake of the Mario vs Luigi gamemode from the New Super Mario Bros DS download game. Includes the 5 default levels (Grassland, Bricks, Castle, Pipes, and Ice), along with two custom levels: Jungle and Sky! All powerups are implemented and fully faithful to their originals, along with the addition of NSMBWii's Propeller Suit!

Started working on this all the way back in February 2021, all for a mario minigame... wow.


(Please note that the multiplayer servers are hosted via a free cloud trial, which has a 20-user concurrent limit. If you can't connect with this message: "MaxCcuReached", there may be more than 20 users online. Message me on discord @ ipodtouch0218#0400 or comment here if this happens! Any donations go towards higher capacity server hosting!)

Report bugs through GitHub's issue tracker here
